</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the DebugEpochBase and DebugEpochBase::HandleBase classes.

These can be used to write iterators that are fail-fast when LLVM is built with asserts enabled.

<SectionDefinition>

## Defines

### LLVM&#95;DEBUGEPOCHBASE&#95;HANDLEBASE&#95;EMPTYBASE {#a7bf2b0ee7afe46f528355d6c6b61ce36}

<MemberDefinition

</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A base class for data structure classes wishing to make iterators</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (&quot;handles&quot;) pointing into themselves fail-fast.  When building without</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// asserts, this class is empty and does nothing.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DebugEpochBase does not by itself track handles pointing into itself.  The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// expectation is that routines touching the handles will poll on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// isHandleInSync at appropriate points to assert that the handle they&#39;re using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is still valid.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// iterator invalidating modifications in the underlying data structure.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When LLVM is built without asserts, this class is empty and does nothing.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// HandleBase does not track the parent data structure by itself.  It expects</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the routines modifying the data structure to call incrementEpoch when they</Highlight></CodeLine>
